channel.title: How to add a second curency to shops! ex: tokens
channel.description: ok im trying to add a seconds currency to 1 shop. all shops take coins, i want to make one of them take tokens only. how do i do this? is there a tutorial on this? if so please post link :)

public boolean buyitem

look around in it hopefully you should learn something about it
and i think usman made a tut about it
